ComicInfo.Penciller: Dave Ross,James Fry III,Jim Fern,Steve Ditko,Jim Fry,Dave Ross,Jim Fry,Jim Fern,Steve Ditko
ComicInfo.Summary:
Logan escapes from a small time jail just as Bruce Banner is being arrested. When the car he is riding in responds to the call for an escaped murderer, the Hulk watches helplessly as Wolverine is gunned down by the cops.
Stingray saves his wife from his psychopathic (and super powered) brother-in-law.
